ing: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
1/2 jalapeno pepper with seeds, or more to taste
des: "Cashews are used as a non-dairy base in this delicious sauce with a jalapeno kick. Perfect on salads, rice bowls, or tacos. Store, covered, in the refrigerator."
ins:
Combine cashews, green chile peppers, hemp milk, jalapeno pepper, and salt in a blender; process until smooth.
Pour blended mixture into a small bowl; stir in cilantro.
